id:
Austria will let electric cars drive faster, use bus lanes and get free parking
NextBigFuture.com
paragraph:
Austria is allowing electric cars to drive at 130 kilometers per hour (80 mph) instead of 100 kilometers per hour (60 mph) on the IG-L highway.This affects 440 kilometers of highway.The next step is to open bus lanes for e-cars and offer free parking for e-cars.
